meta.title: Donation To West Contra Costa Public Education Fund

h5.span: During school closures and the COVID-19 crisis, the Ed Fund will be directing community donations to support families in need identified by the WCCUSD Office of Family & Community Engagement. Support could include groceries, internet services and other emergency needs that help stabilize families during this crisis.

strong.span: Yes, I'd be glad to make a donation today to support our students and teachers here in West County.
All donations to the Ed Fund are unrestricted, unless you select a specific area you would like your donation to go towards.
Donations made to fiscal projects and to adopt-a-school funds are restricted to those purposes.

span.span: Thank you for your donation. It means a lot to us that you support the work we are doing for our students!

input.name: cover_fee
input.span: Please add $x.xx to my donation to cover the processing fee

div.div: If you would like to manage your account online, please create a username and password below.

div.br:
-Min. 6 characters / Max. 15 characters
-One uppercase letter
-One special character

input.name: empmatch
input.label: Would you like your employer to match?

div.p: Why do we need your employee information?
div.span: We will send you an email with a link to your company's charitable donation matching form, with instructions.

input.label: I would like to dedicate my donation to someone special

li.a: What shows up on my statement?

div.p: This transaction will appear on your credit card statement as DON* West Contra Costa Pu. West Contra Costa Public Education Fund has partnered with GiveDirect to securely process online payments.

All information collected by GiveDirect is securely processed and stored. We take many measures to protect the confidentiality and security of your information. We use encryption technology to ensure the safe transmission and storage of your information. Your personal information and donation amount is shared with West Contra Costa Public Education Fund, but no information is shared with third parties by selling, giving, trading or any other method. Users of this site will not receive unsolicited contact from third parties.

A printable receipt page is displayed on your computer screen at the end of your transaction. We will also email a receipt to the email address you provide. The email will come from donations@givedirect.org. For a recurring transaction, a receipt is emailed to you each month, quarter, or year after the transaction processes.
